choices.C: An HSRP group can be secured by using MD5.
choices.A: Up to four HSRP gateways can forward traffic simultaneously.
choices.B: HSRP gateways use BFD for faster failure detection.
choices.D: Up to six HSRP gateways can forward traffic simultaneously.

discussion.content:
Also think it is A.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/nexus5500/sw/fabricpath/7x/fp_n5500_config/fp_n5500_interfaces.html
"The active HSRP router advertises the anycast switch ID as the source switch ID in FabricPath IS-IS. The leaf switches learn that the anycast switch ID is reachable by all of the routers in the group. Cisco NX-OS supports a maximum of four gateways."
It wouldn't be B since it's asking the advantage of anycast HSRP over HSRP version 2.

Couldnt be A? https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/switches/nexus-9000-series-switches/white-paper-c11-740217.html 
With FabricPath, a four-way all-active first-hop gateway approach exists with the usage of anycast HSRP.

questions.question_text: Cisco FabricPath is implemented in a data center. You plan to implement anycast HSRP. What is an advantage of anycast HSRP as compared to HSRPv2?
Which use case requires a design that contains multiple VRF instances in a VDC?

choices.D: Provide Layer 3 isolation within a VDC.
choices.B: Provide a route policy for incoming packets.
choices.C: Provide routing updates between Layer 3 interfaces.
choices.A: Provide VRF-aware services to all Layer 3 interfaces.

questions.question_text: Which feature can be used to deploy overlapping IP address spaces within a tenant in the Cisco ACI fabric?

discussion.content:
A: Private networks (also called
VRFs or contexts) are defined
within a tenant to allow
isolated and potentially
overlapping IP address space.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. Which two descriptions of the purpose of the L1-L2 links between FI A and FI B are true? (Choose two.)

choices.B: provides a vPC peer link between the fabric interconnects
choices.C: allows each fabric interconnect to monitor the status of the other fabric interconnect continuously
choices.E: migrates VIFs from FI A to FI B if FI A fails
choices.D: provides an alternate data path if an upstream link fails

questions.question_text: Which three actions must you perform to implement Cisco FabricPath on a data center network? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
1. VLAN should be configured as Fabric Path (vlan 999,mode fabricpath)
2. Interface should be configured as Fabric Path (int e2/1, switchport, switchport mode fabricpath)
3. Feature-set "fabricpath" should be enabled.

choices.B: Configure the interface to use the STP type of normal.
choices.A: Configure the VLAN in FabricPath mode.
choices.D: Configure the interfaces in trunk mode.
choices.C: Configure the interfaces in FabricPath mode.
